articles.description: Baroness Floella Benjamin, 72, has described the night she was seduced by David Bowie at a party before his wife Angie went on to proposition her.
articles.content:
Baroness Floella Benjamin has described the surreal night she was seduced by the late David Bowie when he offered her 'the world' at a party before his wife Angie went on to proposition her.

articles.title: 'Desperate for approval' Prince Harry urged to 'stop giving interviews' - Express
articles.description: PRINCE HARRY has been described as 'desperate for approval' by a royal commentator over his interviews with the US media.
